portfolioItems.title: Bus Stop Shelter
portfolioItems.subtitle: Design Competition Proposal
portfolioItems.content:
**Team lead** in conceptualizing a weather-proof, double-decker, IOT-forward, and fundamentally Abu Dhabi bus shelter for the Abu Dhabi Projects and Infrastructure Center (ADPIC).

Developed over the course of **1.5 months** as a team of three, I was responsible for:
- **Research:** bus stop & system case studies, local bus system, material selection 

- **Renders:** Sketchup models, Twinmotion renders

- **Organization:** Coordinated team tasks & materials, documented research methods & resources, synthesized design intention in Concept Statement

portfolioItems.title: Wayfinding Redesign
portfolioItems.subtitle: For the NYUAD Library
portfolioItems.content:
Devised curated solutions addressing NYUAD library problems expanding on library admin design brief that increase **legibility** and **accessibility**, improve **physical and digital navigation**, and establish a **strong visual identity** 
###Responsible for all creation of:
- custom icons- branding guidelines- photoshop visuals- mockups

portfolioItems.content1:
Created an interactive dashboard for monitoring and analyzing renewable energy consumption patterns across multiple facilities.

### Project Scope
This full-stack web application was designed to help facility managers track and optimize their renewable energy usage across multiple locations.

### Technologies Used
- **Frontend**: React, D3.js for data visualization
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express
- **Database**: PostgreSQL
- **Duration**: 2 months

### Key Achievements
- Real-time data processing from multiple energy sources
- Interactive charts and graphs for trend analysis
- Automated reporting system
- Mobile-responsive design
portfolioItems.content2:
Developed a comprehensive smart home automation system using Arduino and various sensors for environmental monitoring and control.

### Project Overview
This project focused on creating an integrated IoT ecosystem that could monitor and control various aspects of a home environment including temperature, humidity, lighting, and security systems.

### Technical Implementation
- **Hardware**: Arduino Uno, Raspberry Pi, various sensors
- **Software**: Custom mobile application, web dashboard
- **Duration**: 3 months

### Key Features
- Real-time environmental monitoring
- Remote control via mobile app
- Automated responses to environmental changes
- Energy consumption tracking
